name: The Great Gatsby
intro: In 1922, Nick Carraway, a Yale graduate and World War I veteran, moves to Long Islandâ€™s North Shore and becomes entangled with the extravagant Jay Gatsby, who is famous for his lavish parties. The story explores themes of wealth, society, and love in the American Dream, highlighting the moral decay hidden behind the glamorous facade of the 1920s.
